name: @nuclei-components/page-sections
description: A simple section solution for your single page or landing page. Vanilla js, no framework dependencies, small footprint.
author: Lukas Oppermann

scripts.build: npm run building && cp dist/page-sections.js docs/page-sections.js
scripts.test: standard src/*.ts --parser typescript-eslint-parser | snazzy && tsc src/*.ts --noEmit --pretty --alwaysStrict --allowJs --noUnusedLocals --target ES5 --lib es6,dom && standard-readme
